column2: A blood bond to the Domitor.  Rarely broken, this bond of kindred vitae makes the thrall adore their Domitor.
A blood bond to the Domitor.  Rarely broken, this bond of kindred vitae makes the thrall adore their Domitor.
This ghoul no longer receives vitae from their Domitor.  This slightly weakens the blood bond, but does not break it.
This individual has become entranced by the majestic presence of a vampire.
The innate, mystical power concentrated in dead veins.  It grows over time or through diablerie

Methuselah. One of the most powerfull known vampires.
Methuselah. One of the most powerfull known vampires.
One of the most common vampire genaration.
One of the most common vampire genaration.

Drain the vampire prisoner till their soul is consumed.  The diablerist's aura shows the marks of diablerie.  If the victim had a higher blood potency than the diablerist, the diablerist's blood potency increases.
Drain a prisoner of all their blood--killing them. A cruel act.
Drain a mortal vessel of all their blood.  The mortal dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a werewolf kinfolk mortal vessel of all their blood.  The mortal dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a werewolf vessel of all their blood.  The werewolf dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a mage vessel of all their blood.  The mage dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a demon vessel of all their blood.  The demon dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a geist vessel of all their blood.  The geist is destroyed.   A cruel act.
Drain a changeling vessel of all their blood.  The changeling dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a mummy vessel of all their blood.  The mummy is destroyed.   A cruel act.
Drain a promethean vessel of all their blood.  The promethean is destroyed.   A cruel act.
Use your vampiric blood to create a squad of ghoulish warriors.  This will raise your blood thirst.
Kill a group of mortals and raise them as your vampiric childer to use as war fodder.  This will raise your blood thirst greatly.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your wound.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your severe injury.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your maimed body.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your blinded eyes.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your genetalia.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your disfigured face.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your damaged eye.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your hand.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your leg.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your mangled body.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to awaken a member of your dynasty in torpor.  This will increase your blood thirst but only a chance to awaken the vampire in torpor.
Give some of your blood to a mortal, making them blood-bound thrall of a vampire. Creating a ghoul will cause your blood thirst to grow.
Turn a mortal human into a vampire.  They will have your clan and bloodline. Creating a vampiric spawn will cause your blood thirst to grow.
Turn a mortal human into a vampire.  They will have your clan and bloodline. Creating a vampiric spawn will cause your blood thirst to grow.
Has a small chance of turning a werewolf into a vampire. They will have your clan and bloodline. Creating a vampiric spawn will cause your blood thirst to grow.
Has a small chance of turning [Root.GetTitledFirstName] into an abomination, a terrifying vampire-werewolf hybrid. More often than not, however, it will only result in [Root.GetHerHis] death.

Bloodbind the vampire prisoner to you as domitor.  This thrall will desire to please you.  You feed your blood to your thrall over three nights to make the bond last for a milennia--this will cause your blood thirst to grow.

A wight is a vampire who have lost the entirety of their morals. They are, for all intents and purposes, the Beast within themselves. A character who has fallen to Wassail can never be saved or again played.
Your hunger is unquenchable!  You surrender to the Beast! You enter Wassail--your last frenzy. You become ravenous monster in constant frenzy.  You will be hunted until your last night.
Your hunger grows. You now have the Blood Thirst!
Your hunger grows. You now have the Severe Blood Thirst!
Your hunger grows. You now have the Dreadful Blood Thirst!
Your hunger grows. You now have the Dire Blood Thirst! You have a high chance of either falling into Torpor, or into Wassail and becoming a Wight!

The only thought you can think of is for your Dire Blood Thirst.  How much longer can this go on.  You are starving.  You fade in and out of consciouness--only to awaken near frenzy. You must have blood!
Your blood thirst decreases from direness.
Your blood thirst decreases in dread.
Your blood thirst decreases in severity..
Your thirst for blood is slaked..

Will you abidcate your titles? Will reliquinsh your holdings as Prince of the undead to your heirs? Will you give up your place in kindred society?  Will you go into hiding so that your enmies will not discover your torpid form? Will you seek the slumber of the ages?
Atlast! Rest!  What nightmares make come?
You fall into the deep sleep of the undead. How long will you hold to the edge of the abyss? Years? Decades? Cenutries?
Do I hear a whisper? I still thirst for blood.
Having found a group of men who seem servicable as a militia, you prepare to share with them your vampiric blood to bind their will to yours and enhance their strength.
They aren't worth the blood to me.
You come upon a group of mortals.  While most likely they will never be heirs to your dynasty, you have need of vampiric warriors who far exceed the abilities of humans.
Arise and embrace the night, my childer!
No, I will not bring damnation unto them.
You concentrate on your wound and begin to invoke the healing of the blood.  You feel the blood thirst growing inside you, the beast seeking to be unchained.
Feel the power of the blood!
No. I will survive as I am. For this night...
You concentrate on your maimed body and begin to invoke the healing of the blood.  You feel the blood thirst growing inside you, the beast seeking to be unchained.
Feel the power of the blood!
No. I will survive as I am. For this night...

You have increased your mastery of the blood.
There is still more I could know!
[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has responded to your mystical summoning.
Welcome to my parlor, said the spider to the fly.
You have mesmerized [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] and can demand from them a favor.
[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has become entranced by your presence.
To know me is to love me.
[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] was hunted and drained of all blood--killing them.
was killed by a rampaging wolf
Secretly hunt down this mortal and drain all of their blood to reduce your blood thirst.  You wil be invoking your hunting discplines to do so for an increase in blood thirst. A cruel act.

[new_exposes_masquerade.GetTitledFirstName] saw you violate the Silence of Blood, revealing yourself as a vampire.  The Masquerade has been breached. What shall be done with [new_exposes_masquerade.GetFirstName]?

[new_exposes_masquerade.GetTitledFirstName] saw [vampire_exposes_masquerade.GetTitledFirstName] violate the Silence of Blood, revealing [vampire_exposes_masquerade.GetFirstName] as a vampire.  The Masquerade has been breached. What shall be done with [new_exposes_masquerade.GetFirstName]?

[vampire_exposes_masquerade.GetTitledFirstName] has violated the Silence of Blood, revealing themself as a vampire.  The Masquerade has been breached. What shall be done with [vampire_exposes_masquerade.GetFirstName]?
This is not forgiven or forgotten [vampire_exposes_masquerade.GetTitledFirstName].
A vampire violated the Silence of Blood.  The Masquerade has been breached.

Your guards have brought you a vampire claiming to be your childe.  He has come to submit to your will and be recognized as your childe.  He says he was among those embraced and sent into battle but he has thrived so far in his new unlife.
You are either lucky or worthy.  We will see which it is, my childe.
Yes, but you will be bound to me. (Will increase bloodthirst)
You have used your powers of Serpentis to assume a Divine Form.  You are stronger, tougher, and inspire awe.
Use your powers of Serpentis to assume a Divine Form which makes you stronger, tougher, and inspires awe.

[From.global_living_characters.GetValue] total characters alive.

[From.global_childe_characters.GetValue] childer alive.
[From.global_province_count.GetValue] provinces.
[From.global_cull_times.GetValue] culls - [From.global_cull_amount.GetValue] useless gits culled!
This individual has become convinced their liege is a tyrant that must be removed.
This individual has an intense dislike for the target.

New players to the mod are encouraged to read through this short introduction. If you are new please read about the bookmarks.\nWARNING:  After startup, it can take a few days before everyone gains their supernatural traits. The first month will be full of death as the mod creates supernatural rulers and removes mortal ones. If you use a custom character and you do not pick the correct traits the mod will not function correctly (look at a canon character to see the required trait setup). If you pick a mortal ruler you will die in a few days.\nWe hope you enjoy your time with the mod. Please leave us feedback on Steam or Discord - we love both good and bad feedback.  There is a channel on discord to share your World of Darkness stories.  Rating and favoriting the mod is appreciated!
I have no time for this!

If you are new to playing as a vampire it is highly suggested you choose the 1230 bookmark and play a ruler in the Iberian peninsula. As a vampire, your armies will start small and you must build your influence over the populace. The new buildings indicate your influence over the populace, without them, you are all alone. Technology is overhauled and also indicates your influence over the world.  Plots have been overhauled to better reflect the World of Darkness and Vampires in particular. Age and generation are important for Vampires. They influence your effectiveness in battle and plots. Larger population cities give Vampire princes more potential influence and larger broods of vampires.
I have no time for this!

There are many startdates in the mod currently. You are encouraged to play 1230 and pick a Vampire Lord if it is your first time playing the mod. The map is intended to represent the supernatural world and their influence over the mortal one - not the mortal world! Vampires currently have the most involved supernatural gameplay features. 1230 is the War of Princes based on Vampire: Dark Ages and is the most fleshed out bookmark. 1505 is the Council of Thorns based on Vampire: Dark Ages featuring the establishment of the Camarilla and Sabat. 1355 is a shattered world version of Vampire: Dark Ages during the Black Plague. 1506 is a Camarilla and Sabbat Vampire shattered world version. 737 is mage only shattered world. 1215 is Dark Ages Fae. 1466 is mage only shattered world. If you play as a vampire and are new it is highly recommended you read the tips.  Werewolves in a world dominated by vampires is a hard start.
I have no time for this!

Old vampires are old for a reason - you should not plot against them unless you are skilled in intrigue or have competent allies who like you. Rivals are very dangerous and should be dealt with as best you can. You will have a very limited demense and need vassals. Don't trust them. To be safe, expect everyone to be plotting your demise. They probably are anyway.\nYou can embrace mortals by right clicking on them.  Ghouls can be created easily but cost precious blood. You should mind your bloodthirst or you will become a wight. The best way to get rid of bloodthirst is to hunt or feed on mortals or wait until it goes away. Dire blood thirst can lead to frenzy or worse. Mind the masquerade lest the church take an interest in your strongholds.\nCain and the Antediluvians (3rd Generation) cannot be diablerized at this time. Sorry.
I have no time for this!

You can try to embrace Revenants, Fae, Mages and Werewolves into Vampires. Tremere even have a ritual for Mage embraces. Majesty Summon, Majesty Entrancement, Dominate Mesmerize and Dominate Conditioning are very potent tools for Vampire princes. Auspex Aura Perception shows some hidden traits. Secret cults are still very powerful. Ghouls can breed true and create Revenants--hereditary ghouls. You can awaken torpored elders of your dynasty... If you dare to do so. Tremere, Koldun, Derech Lilit and Order of Hermes Mages can do hermetic quests. Malkavian and Nosferatu make excellent spymasters.  They Sow Chaos when assigned to sabotage a province.
I have no time for this!
